Key Match Events: Juan Soto put New York in front in the first inning with a single that scored Torres
Torres' single in the fifth put the Yankees up 2-0
Giancarlo Stanton knocked in a run with a single in the sixth
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge said about Gerrit Cole, 'What a performance by GC to come out here and do his thing'

David Fry said, 'I was just trying to get a pitch to hit. I had some opportunities yesterday to drive some runners in and didn't get the job done. So I was looking to get it done for the boys and luckily it went out.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees will next face either the Tigers or the Guardians
Others: Cleveland ended a streak of 11 defeats in playoff elimination games, a skid dating back to Game 6 of the 1997 World Series
